concept.title: Point of Sale Overview
concept.shortdesc: Square users use the Point of Sale system to run their business effecently. Square POS app is easy to setup and use right away. The Square Point of Sale app is free to use and it allows business owners to get paid right away and give refunds, receive customized analytics reports, check and updtate their inventory, and add customers to their directory all on an easy to use dashboard.

div.p: The Square Point of Sale app offers Square users custimazable real time analyrits reports. These reports can illustrate to business owners which items or sevices are selling well, the certain times that the business is the most profitable, and more.

Analytics Features:
Filter and search items by sales, discounts, and refunds
Customer spending habits
Sale tracking
Anytime analytic check

The Dashboard allows Square users to reduce the amount of paperwork that business owners accumalte. The Dashboard combines all the adminstrative tasks that a business needs in one place for a simple and convient use.

Dashboard Features:
Online Dashboard
Create and track invoices
Manage employee and customer profiles
Square Online Store
Manage Inventory

The Square Point of Sale app creates a convient and simple to use way for business owners to view, manage, and update their inventory stock. Square users can edit items, get real time alerts, and update their stock all form the POS.

Inventory Features:
Free managemnet of inventory anywhere
Easy to read CSV spreadsheat import and export

section.title: Directory
section.p: The Square Customer Directory allows businesses to store important customer history and informaton. Business Owners can upload eisting customers to their directory or manually add them with customer details with the Square POS app.

Custome Directory Features:
Store cards on file securely
Instant profiles
Track sale details'
Personalize customer shopping experience
Send custom digital receipts
